overview:
Erik is an entrepreneur focused on product design, marketing and corporate strategy. He is the co-founder and CEO at Entangled Media, a company focused on making multi-device ownership a simple, contextual reality. Their patent-pending product, younity, is in limited private beta.

Previously, Erik was a consultant for numerous consumer and enterprise software companies. Prior to that, he co-founded NT Objectives, a leading application security company. Prior to that, he was a product manager at Foundstone (acquired by McAfee), where he managed the company’s product FoundScan (currently called “Foundstone Enterprise”) from concept to third generation market leader.

He also held product roles at Epoch Internet and The Boeing Company.
